outputs.name: df_model
outputs.description:
A list of dragonfly objects that have been re-serialized from
the input file.

inputs.name: _hb_models
inputs.description:
A Honeybee Model or list of Honeybee Models to be converted
to a Dragonfly Model.

inputs.name: incl_shades_
inputs.description:
Boolean to note whether orphaned shades should be included
as dragonfly ContextShades. (Default: False).

inputs.name: _load
inputs.description: Set to "True to load the objects from the _df_file.

name: DF Model From Honeybee
description:
Create a Dragonfly Model from a Honeybee Model.
-
